body:
@karlht Can you review this PR as a representative for QA? We normally have Chris Hartjes review all of our PRs on the project for good test coverage and QA usability, but he is at a conference this week. This PR is merging a long-running feature branch that we've been working on into our master branch so we can deploy it. All the code on the branch has been reviewed by both dev and QA in other PRs, with the exception of the last 3 commits.

This commit is blocking several other things we'd like to move forward with, otherwise we'd wait until Chris was back.

All the code on the branch has been reviewed by both dev and QA in other PRs, with the exception of the last 3 commits.
This commit is blocking several other things we'd like to move forward with, otherwise we'd wait until Chris was back.
body_html:
@karlht Can you review this PR as a representative for QA? We normally have Chris Hartjes review all of our PRs on the project for good test coverage and QA usability, but he is at a conference this week. This PR is merging a long-running feature branch that we've been working on into our master branch so we can deploy it. All the code on the branch has been reviewed by both dev and QA in other PRs, with the exception of the last 3 commits.

This commit is blocking several other things we'd like to move forward with, otherwise we'd wait until Chris was back.
